articles.author: Josh Halliday
articles.title: Gary Lineker row hits BBC's Match of the Day 2 and WSL coverage - The Guardian
articles.description: Disruption to sports programming continues into second day as pressure grows on BBC chairman Richard Sharp
articles.content:
The BBC has been forced to scale back a second day of sports programming amid a deepening row over the suspension of Gary Lineker.
The corporation will air a shortened version of Match of the Day 2 … [+5371 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Israeli forces kill three Palestinians in occupied West Bank - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Israeli army says ‘gunmen opened fire’ at an army position west of Nablus and their soldiers responded with ‘live fire’.
articles.content:
The Israeli military says its forces shot and killed three Palestinian men who opened fire on soldiers in the occupied West Bank, the latest bloodshed in a year-long wave of violence in the region.

articles.title: SpaceX capsule returns crew of four from space station mission - Reuters.com
articles.description: Four crew members aboard a SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule splashed down off Florida's Gulf coast on Saturday, returning safely from a five-month science mission on the International Space Station.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, March 11 (Reuters) - Four crew members aboard a SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule splashed down off Florida's Gulf coast on Saturday, returning safely from a five-month science mission on the In… [+2220 chars]
